title: EventBridge Pipes schema validation
description: Validate and convert Kafka events from Avro to JSON using EventBridge Pipes

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern uses AWS Glue Schema Registry to deserialize Avro messages into JSON messages using Amazon Eventbridge Pipes and an enrichment AWS Lambda function.
The enrichment Lambda function is written in Java and uses the AWS Glue Schema Registry Library.
See the GitHub repository for a detailed description of how the pattern works and how to deploy it.
